title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
corded:

We learned that Astarion might be a vampire! A monster hunter named Gandrel is looking for him. We fought a monster hunter who was looking for Astarion. Astarion killed a monster hunter who had been looking for him.

As you continue your journey with Astarion, and converse with him at the camp, you can learn additional details about him which will be recorded in your journal:

Astarion told us that he suspects the monster hunter is serving his master Cazador. After spending the night wi
